fixed_skill.desc: 35.0/36.8/38.5% chance to inflict Dizzy on 1 foe for 1 turn. Increase base accuracy by 15.0/15.8/16.5% for each Blessing on the user. Stacks up to 4 times.
fixed_skill.name: Dizzy Needle

innate_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to 57.6/60.9/64.2% of Attack. Gain 0 to 1 Blessing stacks.
innate_skill.name: Makouha

innate_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to 1 foe equal to 79.2/87.3/95.4% of Attack. Low chance to deal a Bless insta-kill effect to foes with 50% or less HP. Increase chance based on foe's missing HP.
innate_skill.name: Hama

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 10%. After using a skill, 30% chance to gain 1 Blessing stack. If the skill deals Bless damage, gain 1 more Blessing stack.
passive_skill.name: Sublime Luminance

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment accuracy by 10%. After using a skill, 70% chance to gain 1 Blessing stack. If the skill deals Bless damage, gain 1 more Blessing stack.
passive_skill.name: Sublime Luminance I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to 90.0%/96.3%/102.6% of Attack. Increase damage taken by 19.6%/21.0%/22.3% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
